downloadTitle: Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset Deployment Guide
downloadDescription: This guide helps you choose among DaRT deployment methods, and provides step-by-step guidance for each method.
detailsSection:
This guide describes how to install DaRT and its prerequisites. It also compares the deployment methods available for DaRT to help you choose the best solutions for your environment; then it offers step-by-step instructions for each method. The methods discussed in this guide are: removable discs and USB media, manual installation to the local hard drive, and installation to the local hard drive using System Center 2012 Configuration Manager.
 Installation to the local hard drive by using Microsoft Deployment Toolkit 2012 (MDT 2012)
 Delivery to PCs as a network service by using Windows Deployment Services (Windows DS)
systemRequirementsSection: This guide is available in PDF format. To access the file. you will need Adobe Reader or a compatible PDF reader.
installInstructionSection: Click the Download button and open the file directly or save it to your local machine for future reference.
